content: Use this app all the time. Have now had to upgrade my laptop, but am unable to install the app on the PC with my Legacy program. Would I have to re-purchase it? Not ideal, and it is such a handy tool to have on your mobile to capture informatoin on the go.

I find this app very useful but it could do with a decent upgrade. One could be the ability to sync with the program with Legacy, in real time not just the usual way we have to do it now, on a laptop so you can update either program. I generally use Families to check details on the go and being a researcher I can check other peoples trees. But I'd have to refer to Legacy if I wanted to print a decent tree or report. Ive not found an better app either.

I literally use the Families app every day. I've read some of the negative reviews and they seem to be mostly about not being able to sync their devices with their Legacy files. I have not had any problems doing this with my Android; it works well for me. Having my genealogy data with me at all times has been a lifesaver. When I go to a library/archive or out of town on a research trip, I am able to look up anyone I have a question about to be sure I have the right person, right dates, right places, etc. There's no way I can remember all the details for everyone in my file, so the Families app is essential for me. One of the best things about the app is that when I am at a family gathering, my relatives will come to me knowing that I'm the family historian and ask me questions. I grab my phone, look up the person in question, and am able to provide the answer since I have the person's details as well as all my notes and sources in the Families app. People are very impressed when they see that. I love this app!
Works like a dream!
Very useful to check your family history records on the move

I rarely take the time to write a review...only if I'm extremeley happy with the product or if I'm very dissatisfied. In this case it is the latter. I agree with Linda and Christine. After messing with with the app for about 30 minutes trying to get my Legacy file onto my Android I finally figured out what it was asking me about the file! Once I figured that out, I tried to sync using the USB and everything looked like it was running but it didn't appear on the app on my phone. Then I tried to sync by Wi-Fi. I still can't see the file on my Families app. I don't consider myself an idiot when it comes to technology. Better instructions are needed to walk people through the process. It is not intuitive nor user friendly.

I can not get it to transfer from the PC to the Android phone. I have tried every name from my Legacy file that I can think of and it says the name is not recognizable. I need some help with this. I was so looking forward to carrying my family tree with me. I would like to know what I am doing wrong and where I can go for help.

Waste of money. Can not work out how to sync my legacy files to phone and instructions are useless for a novice like me. Would like a refund since can't use. Even emailed for help but no reply, so no help offered.
Use it all the time. You can download all your genealogy from Legacy. Easy to use.
I entered about 15 or more names in Legacy on my PC last night. When I transferred the file to my phone or tablet none of the names showed on either device. What gives?
I had that problem too Jack but the new update seems to have fixed it. I can't be without it!!

I bought this app a few weeks ago thinking about future use. I ended up going to a genealogy conference and ended up using it the entire weekend! I pulled up all my family and media. It was absolutely amazing. I told everyone about it. They were all eager to get it since they saw it in use. Thank You for creating this!!
Wonderful app to enable access to Legacy data on Android. Latest update clears the problem I had that stopped Families working. Now great again
This was a good program until recently. I have reported this numerous times and get know response. Why is it still available for puchase?

Have owned it for years with no problems, until recently(a few months back) NOW, It crashes every time you try to run it on my cell hone which has had no major changes.  What's the matter programmers? Help /answers would be nice.
Excellent!
It crashes every time you try to run it. I bought it several years ago and am installing it on a new tablet.

This worked very well then suddenly Stopped Working on my Desktop.          I have since changed Phone and this will not allow my to sync to my phone. Problem event APPCRASH. No support from TelGen at this time
It gets better with every release. Very handy to have my entire genealogy file with me at all times.
Unable to download. Keeps telling me there is an error and try again later.
Don't like the new bright color. Would prefer the option for a darker theme. Other wise very good app.
Latest update turns this app into 5 stars.
Great app syncs with Legacy really useful.

Using Samsung Galaxy Note 5, I was unable to get this app to load my legacy file from Dropbox... It was converted to an sqlite file and never loaded properly, getting the errors saying the app crashed. I sent in feedback multiple times over a week and the single Support Tech gave me a list of things to try. Nothing worked. I was told that I should try one of the other ways however the app claims to work with Dropbox and that's what I need to use.
Greast program for showing off, or just checking on my data from my Legacy family tree. The display is very logical and easy to see and use.
Worked well on my HTC desire, Samsung S3, S5 and now S7.  Wonderful.

Very usefull application for me. Synchronization between my android device and PC is good - no problem. And my family tree is available for me - anytime and anywhere. Great job. I can recommend for Legacy Family tree users.  After last update Master list address works well!
Great program. Integrates well with Legacy 8
Very happy with this app

Although it was working fine before, when I attempted to install the latest update on 16 Oct 2016 it will not install. As a result I can no longer use this. This is now the next day and today the App installed without problems. I do get an error when trying to convert a Legacy 8.0 file and had to use the 7.5 version of my data. I thought it is supposed to work with Legacy 8.0
This is the best app for Legacy 8.0 for the Android.  It does everything I could ever ask of the software.
I would like a refund.

This never seems to work for me. I've tried transferring files from Vista and Windows 10 to an LG L-90 and my Galaxy Note 4 and it never works. Most of the time the transfer freezes or the app just doesn't recognize the files. I tried getting support once, but was only told it should work. Well, I could have told myself that. I spent money on something broken and never got a refund.
Hi, I would like this app to open an fdb file that I have already downloaded to my phone. Thanks. God bless. Aaron
This app is perfect for my Legacy files.  With more than 5000 members in my tree file, it sure helps to be able to carry it with me and reference at a moments notice. ☺
I assume the wifi transfer program also converts the fbd file into sqlite3 format. It would be more useful to use the native database format so the fbd can be stored in the cloud and kept synced.
Good program could be great with a little more work. Putting pictures can be difficult at times. Search needs improved.
it sucks used to work but now when you bring up a family it goes to small print on android work on it and fix

Bought this as a recommendation,  tried to load a ged file it does not recognise it nor is there anyway to load it thought my file was corrupt but loaded a free app and it opened it staight away I want a refund
I had given up on this app a year and a half ago because I found it so cumbersome to transfer.  I just used their 'Dropbox' option and WOW!  It could not have been easier!
When I try to download on my new ASUS ZenFone I get error 194. This is a purchased app. I would like to be able to use it.

Fonts for the main screen are good now. Can the date of birth have a similar font?  The fonts have been reduced again. There is enough space for a larger font. What about the date of birth font? Can you please increase the dob font? Why was the date of birth font not increased to match the other fonts? Yet another update without increasing the date of birth font. Another update and yet the date of birth font wasn't increased.
Useless. Cannot enter many of the details. Uninstalled this app.
If you use Legacy & a smartphone and/or tablet, then you want this to always have your tree(s) photos,  documents et al with you!

A great app. A little learning was needed and I'm still learning.But it's great to sit with elderly relatives over a coffee and pick their memory and record it right onto my phone. No bulky laptops or napkins . The fonts don't bother me I just want the great mobility  I now have .Thanks

This app is an excellent Android companion to PCs Legacy. Using Families Sync, I had no difficulties in transferring my Legacy files and photos to my BAUHN Android tablet via a USB connection. The end result was great all-be-it a simplified version of Legacy. A great app that makes my family history research very mobile.

Works better on iPhone text size is too small on Android even on a large screen.  All that real estate with tiny tiny letters. Interface is confusing and I often get bumped out the database as a result &  have to log back in.
App has great potential. However, not easy to access additional spouses and families on fgs,  hard when you have multiple spouses in a data base of 70,000 plus and you can't remember their names.
Great app for keeping your family handy.
Nothing like it.
Great to be able to bring my data with me
The only decent offline family tree app I've yet seen for Android. After the last update, the UI looks a lot smoother. I would recommend it for all Legacy Family Tree users.
This is a great app.  It is easy to use and you always have your family with you.  Great for starting family conversations to get more information.

I've downloaded version 2.0.0, but the font is so small on my phone that I have trouble reading the data. Font was bigger in previous versions, but I can find no way to resize it. Other than that, the program is great!

Useful for checking the odd ancestor, but I've tried using it for research away from home and it's not easy to see all the info I need quickly.  It would help if the baptism date was shown on the main page for a person, especially where there is no birth date.  Perhaps a different design for tablets, where there is more room for info than on phones.
It meets my mobile genealogy needs very well.
I have a large tree, over 14000 names and they all fit on my phone.

Update - fonts now fixed.  Fonts too small in Family view on Galaxy S4	Fantastic app but the fonts are almost too small to read on the S4's 1920 x 1080 screen. Was not a problem on my previous S3. Only an issue on the Family screen but as this is the main navigation screen this is a problem. Running latest versions of both Android app (1.8.2) and PC software (1.5.2.0). Rating is down due to these usability issues. When fixed back to five stars for a great app.
Fonts now fixed for newer galaxy s4.
Keep receiving the error msg: auto increment is only allowed on an integer primary key when trying to sync by wi-fi
Not so ptactical and functional for editing.

When you enter a location for death, it changes the location for birth too.  Will only accept one location for both birth and death.  If you blank out the location for death, it erases the place of birth as well.  Must put everything into "Notes".
Very pleased to have this along with my home Legacy software, makes life a lot easier when out and about. Thank you!
I don't expect my phone to be all things genealogy, but this app is a handy way to carry an aweful lot of research data in my pocket.
Great app Best so far but on landscape l get stuck because the menu bar does not show

Update: Deleted the text files in the "Run" directory under the Families directory on the SD card. Now I can bring up and open the files. I would give 4 stars except that the Relationships setting feature still doesn't work as described!	Stopped running on Dell Streak5 after last update All of a sudden, after running fine since June.  Then updated in last month and now just a black scr
Works great on my Incredible.  Nice to always have my Legacy database at my fingertips.
Cannot get data to load on Asus Transformer TF101 - useless to me
I was really excited about the bug fixes but app suddenly started to force close repeatedly. Can't access my file. Please fix.

Just installed Families on my new phone. Works GREAT!!!! What a cool app...you can even click on the thumbnail photos for larger images. Can't wait to see what other future enhancements the developers of this app come up with.

I've converted my Legacy Family Tree file and installed it on the SD card in my Droid X, but the program only shows the demo "Kennedy Family" file. This program doesn't work. I've contacted tech support but haven't heard back yet.
Very impressed running well on my Huawai X5.Invaluable to be able access Legacy data at any time and add edit notes etc view pics doc's etc-Great
Downloaded and installed painlessly on my Motorola MB525. The Families synch software likewise had no instal problems under Win 7 64-bit. Good app!
Installation took 15 min. Works great! Took my 73 mb family file right down, and only choked on 3 big TIFF files. Don't worry, files go on sd card.
Took two times to download small family tree and it took five to six times to download larger family tree. Kept getting "unexpected error".
This program is an excellent companion to Legacy. In addition, the program developer is helpful, responsive and very courteous.
Took second attempt to successfully load large 24mb file, but worth it. Looks great once working. NICE.
